“A mystic in the sense that she’s still mystified by things.”  
🌱🌸🌊🍃🌛🍄🪨🌿
 -She/Her -Tinker gremlin by day -Forest goblin by night  -Weighs the same as a duck -Listens when nature speaks  -Adversary of ubiquitous advertising -Recalls the old ‘net well -Doing her part to bring curiosity and serendipity back!
